name: Keyboard Surf Dinosaure Attack
description:
How to play

Remember the path shown on the keyboard and follow it by pressing the respecting keys on your keyboard. (Only QWERTZ and QWERTY keyboards supported)

You can shoot at the dinosaurs by holding space down and pressing on a key on the keyboard. Your character will shoot towards the key you pressed.

For each right key you walk on you get ammo.

Development

We, Morris(@BorrisMitM) and Flo(@Kawankaaa),  made this game in 3 days just for fun.
